# Instruction restrictions

Can only use these:

3E XX     | ld a, XX
32 XX YY  | ld (YYXX), a
21 XX YY  | ld hl, YYXX
22 XX YY  | ld (YYXX), hl
18 XX     | jr XX
76        | halt
C3 XX YY  | jp YYXX

# First 4 pixels
